articles.title: WATCH:  How American zoos are helping animals beat the scorching heat
articles.content: With summer in full swing and temperatures on the rise, Whit Johnson shares how zoos are helping animals across America beat the heat.
articles.personality_presentation:
Bloody hell, this is beautiful! WATCH:  How American zoos are helping animals beat the scorching heat

Look at this gorgeous story: With summer in full swing and temperatures on the rise, Whit Johnson shares how zoos are helping animals across America beat the heat.

Absolutely stunning! That's what I call a perfect dish of humanity!

articles.title: Raducanu ready for Sabalenka after 'statement' win

articles.title: Citroen owners left stranded over airbag safety risk
articles.content: An estimated 120,000 drivers have been told not to use their vehicles following a fatal accident in France.
